snippet: Cardinal Roger M. Mahony says he has been publicly humiliated in recent days by people who are angry over his handling of the clergy sexual abuse scandal.
lead_paragraph: Cardinal Roger M. Mahony says he has been publicly humiliated in recent days by people who are angry over his handling of the clergy sexual abuse scandal.

headline.main: California: Former Archbishop Writes of Humiliation
headline.print_headline: California: Former Archbishop Writes of Humiliation
